summary:
Enthusiastic and driven people and program manager with several years of experience leading multicultural teams and an evolving portfolio of strategic initiatives and processes aimed at improving and optimizing both service delivery and operations output with global reach and across business lines. 
Sound strategic thinking, excellent stakeholder management, strong communication skills, effective project & program management skills and innovative thought leadership have been the tools in my tool belt that have helped me drive meaningful results across the organizations I have worked in.
I enjoy working in a fast paced, dynamic environment that gives me flexibility to be working on the most impactful and critical topics that in turn also provide me with opportunities to learn and grow. I’m known to be a strong champion for Diversity, Inclusion & Belonging.

profile_positions.description:
Within this role, my main focus has been to define and design Booking.com’s global content moderation services and solutions by building smart capabilities to achieve scale, including leveraging technology led solutions such as machine learning.  

Main responsibilities
Stakeholder management: 
- Define (scaled) content needs and translate those into well defined, documented and scalable end to end solutions, supported by process and tooling
- Ensure buy in from all relevant stakeholders through a clear program definition and sponsorship achieving full solution integration
Strategic thinking: 
- Define and drive the creation and implementation of a long-term, company wide content moderation strategy for Booking.com 
- Staying on top of business direction & industry trends to understand and predict future company content moderation needs 
Program management: 
- Create performance targets and roadmaps (portfolios) and engage cross functional teams and stakeholders in reporting on these targets and roadmaps, to support solution optimization and expansion.
- Leading several cross functional project teams (e.g. Product & Tooling, Analytics, Operations, Legal, Security & Risk, PR, Fraud etc.) to achieve deliverables 
Service Delivery & Optimization: 
- Driving solution optimization based on defined KPIs, SLAs and other operational metrics through automation, tool enhancements, operational efficiencies. 
- Construct business cases to secure necessary resources (human, technical, financial and support) 
People Management: 
- Lead a team of coordinator/process lead/quality lead offering vision, support, coaching, performance feedback and empowering them towards achieving business goals.
